document.full_text: a high-tech wild west where location data, including some gleaned from teenagers' mobile devices, is scooped up and sold without consumers' consent needs to end, lawmakers told a panel of tech companies on thursday.
document.title: facebook, apple pressed on kids' mobile privacy
lines_and_colors: a high-tech wild west where location data, including some gleaned from teenagers' mobile devices, is scooped up and sold without consumers' consent needs to end, lawmakers told a panel of tech companies on thursday.
